income_messages:
From: f**********c@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2022-08-13 00:00:19
SUBJECT:   Attn; Fund Beneficiary
  Attn; Fund Beneficiary
I am Mr.  PAUL  IBE  Group Managing Director/CEO ENTERPRISE BANK PLC 
With reference to your entitlement fund and inline with the CHANGE OF 
BENEFICARY'S APPLICATION, signed by Mrs. Glenda F. Ward with your 
purported authorization. This case has been carefully examined and we 
have declined Mrs. Ward's application and reported to the security 
department for appropriate action, as the application lacks regular 
signature. But Did you ever instruct Mrs Glenda F. Ward to claim your
fund worth US$7.000.000? Below is the bank account information 
provided by Mrs Glenda F. Ward saying that you authorized her to claim 
your fund that you are terminally ill? 
1.BANK NAME: BANK OF AMERICA
2.ACCOUNT NAME: GLENDA WARD
3.BANK ADDRESS: Kerrville Texas 78028 USA
4.ACCOUNT #: 3202650
5.ROUTING #: 114922443 
If you had not authorized the change of your bank account in respect 
to your outstanding entitlement Payment, therefore notify me 
immediately as the notification / declaration was supported with a 
sworn affidavit from Lagos high court ref: ilk /jj/202/k2022, dated 
16/06/2022 and signed by Mrs. Glenda Ward who claim and stated in the 
sworn declaration that you authorized her to claim the said fund on 
your behalf to a different bank account in the U.S.A as stated above
because you were terminally ill and the Doctor who is in charge of 
your case stated that you will not stay more than one Month before 
passing away. 
This development has caused lots of discrepancies in your payment file 
that is why we had to suspend your payment and prompted to contact you 
directly before rejuvenating your payment. You have to be rest assured 
that I will do everything within my capacity to successfully actualize 
the quick transfer of your fund to any of your nominated bank account. 
Kindly get back to me as soon as possible so that I will direct you on 
what to do. 
Regards,
Mr. PAUL  IBE   
From: f**********c@gmail.com
To: vn58102@m**************p
Time: 2022-08-15 11:06:37
SUBJECT: Re: Attn; Fund Beneficiary
Attention  Charles
This  is  an  acknowledgment  of  the  receipt  of your  reply  to  my
 mail,  I  thank  you  for  confirming  to  us  that  you  don’t  know
  MRS   Glenda F. Ward  she  is  an IMPOSTOR  .
Before  you    will  open  an  online  banking  account  with  us
this  is  the  first  step  that  we  will  take , we  will  obtain  a
counter  affidavit  on  your  behalf  from  the  federal  court  of
Appeal  to  court  the  affidavit  that MRS Glenda F. Ward   got  from
 the  federal  high  court
Immediately  we  get  counter  affidavit  your  payment  process  will
 start  with IMMEDIATE   effect  ,we  will    send  a  lawyer  to
court  of   Appeal   to  verify what  it  will  cost  to  get  the
counter  affidavit  today.
I  will  update  you  immediately  we  get  a RESPOND   from  the
lawyer  that  we  send  to  the  court  of APPEAL.
 Regards ,
MR  PAUL  IBE
From: f**********c@gmail.com
To: vn58102@m**************p
Time: 2022-08-16 02:42:18

CONTACT BARRISTER IKEJI KENNETH FOR HM TO HELP YOU GET THE COUNTER

HIS EMAIL  CONTACT ADDRESS IS ikejikenneh@gmail.com

PAUL IBE

 think you have MEAGAIN the problem is with the affidavit. The affidavit is not onerous. Those at the bank who signed the standard affidavit were not impressed. think you need to get some action from the court on your side.

Charles
